page.title: 10Night Nursing-Gloucester
page.content: I work at night on the{post-natal wards at the Gloucester Royal Hospital.When I get to the ward at 8.20pm I receive a report on each patient who is in my care.After we do a general ward round and get the Mums comfortable for the night with supplies of nappies ,bottles of milk or water. We then pay attention to the Mums who are having trouble with their babies eg.poor feeders,underweight babies and Mums who have had operations.Also during the night other Mums are admitted and babies born. At 6.00am all are woken and made ready for the day.Sometimes during the night we get an hour break,sometimes as last night we had 23 Mums and 24 babies.There was just time for a quick snack.I left work at 7.45am.
